The property value entities in the given paragraph are the d2-spacing values of PffBB-n polymers, which are 3.84 Å, 3.82 Å, 3.77 Å, and 3.66 Å for PffBB-10, PffBB-12, PffBB-14, and PffBB-16, respectively. These values indicate the trend of decreasing d2-spacing with increasing length of alkyl side chains.
